items.label: person one
items.description: enter the name of the first person you would like to track (top section of the screen)

items.label: URL one
items.description: enter the URL to the pebble endpoint of the nightscout webapp of the first person; ie: http://*****.herokuapp.com/pebble/

items.label: person two
items.description: enter the name of the second person you would like to track (bottom section of the screen)

items.label: URL two
items.description: enter the URL to the pebble endpoint of the nightscout webapp of the second person; ie: http://*****.herokuapp.com/pebble/

items.label: refresh interval
items.description: set the interval that the app will poll the endpoit for an update
